price: 33. Ma ahase Alle mid cadaabaya – adigoo dhex jooga, mana aha mid cadaabaya iyagoo denbi dhaaf dalbi7.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
footnotes: 7. Ibnu Cabbaas a.k.r. wuxuu yidhi: Waxaa jiray labo ammaan, Nabiga iyo denbi dhaaf dalabka, Nabigii waa tagay oo Alle baa oofsaday, marka waxaa haray denbi dhaaf dalabka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum wa-anta fīhim wamā kāna al-lahu muʿadhibahum wahum yastaghfirūna
